channel.title: CVE Feed for amir20 -- dozzle
channel.description: The latest CVEs for amir20 -- dozzle

item.title: CVE-2024-47182|2024-09-27T14:13:09.811Z -- amir20 -- dozzle
item.description: Dozzle is a realtime log viewer for docker containers. Before version 8.5.3, the app uses sha-256 as the hash for passwords, which leaves users susceptible to rainbow table attacks. The app switches to bcrypt, a more appropriate hash for passwords, in version 8.5.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-47182|2024-09-27T13:58:22.881Z -- amir20 -- dozzle
item.description: Dozzle is a realtime log viewer for docker containers. Before version 8.5.3, the app uses sha-256 as the hash for passwords, which leaves users susceptible to rainbow table attacks. The app switches to bcrypt, a more appropriate hash for passwords, in version 8.5.3.
